metaData.label: Is not a Parent
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title is not equal Parent AND CampaignMember:Common:Title is not equal Student AND CampaignMember:Common:Title is not equal Home schooling parent

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.eventDef1640065508408.CampaignMember:Common:Title" Operator="NotEqual" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Parent]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.eventDef1640065508408.CampaignMember:Common:Title" Operator="NotEqual" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Student]]></Value></Condition><Condition IsEphemeralAttribute="true" Key="Event.eventDef1640065508408.CampaignMember:Common:Title" Operator="NotEqual" UiMetaData="{}"><Value><![CDATA[Home schooling parent]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>

metaData.label: B2B
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Teacher/Educator OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Principal OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Support OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of ICT OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Mathematics OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of English/Literacy OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Science OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head Teacher

metaData.label: B2C
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal parent OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal home schooling parent
